## Group projects  
1. Make sure that your group has a clean, organized repository.  
2. The contributions for each group member should be clear.  
3. Include the presentation slides in the repository.  
4. Make sure everyone has a chance to speak.  
5. You will have 5-6 minutes to present.  
6. The last homework is an evaluation of your project.
